oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Central Bank and Trust Co. Building
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Central Bank and Trust Co. Building, Memphis, Tenn. [typed/pre-printed] -- July 9th – 17 -- Just back to Nashville after -- spending 48 hours home [handwritten]” Color image

“Mrs. J. Jackson -- 554 Alabama Ave -- Memphis -- Tenn -- Arrived at 4:30 -- train being 1 ½ hours -- late. Did not have -- time to send card -- from uptown, but -- street car conductor -- [torn]mised to mail this -- [torn]letter will -- Ben”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Central Bank; banks; businesses; downtown; skyscrapers;
